title: Underneath
description: Look at the person sitting just across from you. It doesn't matter whether theyâ€™re a loved one, a friend, or a complete stranger.Now look at their face. Are they happy? Are they sad? Or are they angry? Can you even tell?How well do you actually know the people closest to you?Have you ever seen the real person that lies just underneath what you see...?
author: Michael Cargill
